alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued August 08 at 6:56PM EDT until August 09 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 115 possible. * WHERE...Okeechobee, Coastal Saint Lucie, Coastal Martin, Inland Saint Lucie and Inland Martin Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat and humidity will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee
